set(NAME_MODULE LowLevelCloth)

set(MODULE_TYPE STATIC)#INLINE STATIC DYNAMIC 

set(HPP_FILES_RECURSE *.h *.hpp)
set(CPP_FILES_RECURSE *.cpp)

set(DEBUG_POSTFIX "DEBUG")
set(CHECKED_POSTFIX "CHECKED")
set(PROFILE_POSTFIX "PROFILE")
set(RELEASE_POSTFIX "")

set(PhysXRoot "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../")
set(LowLevelCloth "${PhysXRoot}/Source/LowLevelCloth")

set(INCLUDES_PRIVATE "${LowLevelCloth}/include"
                     "${LowLevelCloth}/src")

setup_main_module()
